If the company base currency is not allowed currency for payer/payee then transaction will not be able to be submitted for approval.

Award_Contract_Data.description: Indicates whether this award can have a zero amount value.
The direct cost that will be billed to the sponsor for the award.
The indirect costs that will be billed to the sponsor for the award.
The obligated cost share amount for the award.
The maximum amount authorized for billing and collection for transactions  against this award.

validation.validation: The Authorized Amount must be equal to the sum of the Contract Line Amounts.
Update the billing schedules for this award. The billing limits for the schedules exceed the new Authorized Amount.
Update the billing schedules for this award. The billing limits for the schedules exceed the new Billing Limit Override.
At least one and only one award line must be marked as Primary.
Invalid Award Header/Line Lifecycle Status Combination
Select a letter of credit with a currency that matches the award currency.
When Zero Amount Award is True, the Sponsor Direct Cost, Sponsor ~Facilities and Administration~, Authorized Amount, and Billing Limit Override must be zero.
When Zero Amount Award is False, the Authorized Amount must be greater than zero.

Award_Contract_Data.description: The Billing Limit Override for the Award.  If this value is non-zero, Cost Reimbursable billing for this award will not exceed this value.  Otherwise, the Authorized Amount will be used as the Billing Limit.
A boolean flag indicating whether or not the Sponsor requires Cost Share for the award.
The total anticipated Sponsor Direct Cost for the life of the award.
The total anticipated Sponsor indirect cost for the life of the award.

NSF_Code_AllocationObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

validation.description: Award Schedule specified is already associated with another Award.

validation.validation: Award Schedule is required.

Change the Sponsor back to [original sponsor]. The Sponsor cannot be changed because the award has a Billing Schedule.

validation.validation: Change the award currency to match the company currency. You can't select a basis limit when the award currency is different from the company currency.
